website_summaries.verdict: These innovative shin guards are soft and flexible during play and only harden upon impact. They also slide less than traditional shin guards.
pros: Provides a high level of impact protection
Soft, flexible padding only hardens on impact
Comfortable, durable sleeve ensures shin guard won't shift during play
cons: May run small, so consider sizing up when ordering

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and low profile
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a pair of these for my 8 year old for the fall soccer season. They seem to run on the small side so take that into consideration. The shin guards are light and easy to put on. They are not always easy to remove. There is a small price to pay for something so low profile. Overall these have been fantastic and I ended up buying another pair for one of the other soccer players in our family.
customer_reviews.author: michaelsean

customer_reviews.title: These Shin Guards Are Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I got these for my son (8 years old) and he really likes them! He's said that they are really comfortable and they don't slide around as much as his Nike shin guards. Since his calves are skinnier, he slips the sleeves from his other shin guards over the gforms for added security. The only minor complaint he's made is that it is harder to take off. Other than that, it's been great for him! Joe
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and effective
customer_reviews.text: My son (U-10) loves the new shin guards. He always fought the kind that had an ankle guard and the shin guards that just slip into socks tend to move around and bug him. He loves these and he even leaves them on after practice sometimes for hours because he says he forgets he even has them on. He has been kicked a couple times and they are as effective as other shin guards in that regard. They do require some help to pull off though but its not hard for me to pull them off (he just can't get it over his foot by himself).
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Davis

customer_reviews.title: My son doesn't like using shinguards
customer_reviews.text: My son doesn't like using shinguards, period. So this ones are a good choice because they are not bulky as the traditional kind. However, they are very hard to take off, more so than to put them on. Especially if you are sweaty or wet. So this part is really frustrating to my son. We both think that they are not really protective either. So is you are playing a really rough game, this may not be your best choice. Since my son is U10, the kids are still restrained from hitting others, so its still ok. But when he outgrow them we may have to go back to the bulky ugly traditional ones for the sake of protection.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Much better than traditional shin guards
customer_reviews.text: Much better than I expected. Bought these for my 9 yr old son who plays on an academy travel team. Was tired of fighting with him on putting the regular type of shin guards on. We’ve used these for almost a whole season so far. Quality seems great. Much better than the traditional ones that have the loops for your feet. They don’t slide at all. Definitely would buy again if they broke or were lost.
customer_reviews.author: Mikegezz

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t protect my kid
customer_reviews.text: My daughter looks like she has 2 knee caps. That huge lump on her shin occurred when wearing these shin guards for a soccer game. I don’t recommend and don’t think they provide adequate protection.
customer_reviews.author: Eric A

customer_reviews.title: Great low profile for skating.
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable. I like wearing a shin pad when I skate in case I miss on a grind trick and clip a ledge or rail. These aren't usually high impact situations, so having just a little impact absorption is helpful and also increases confidence. They fit really well under a pair of pants and keep your calves cool. I have no idea what these would be like in a higher impact situation like getting kicked, but they are great for skating.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Evans

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: Tiny. Wish I could return. Purchased 1 month ago to the date and return not an option. They are a great concept. My son is 8 and the S/M looks like it could fit a 4 or 5 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These run very small!!!
customer_reviews.text: These aren't what I expected... they're almost like what you'd find in a kid's Halloween costume set. I used the size chart and read the reviews... purchased my 10 year old son a Youth S/M and they are so small he can't even get them over his foot. He tried to use them as forearm guards... but his hands started to go numb, so I guess the next step is to give them to a smaller child.
customer_reviews.author: Magnum

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed so far
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son has been wearing these 4-5 days a week for training and games and loves them. They're holding up very well. No signs of wear after heavy use and washing. The only drawback is they're difficult to take off of a sweaty leg. I guess this could also be seen as a positive since they don't move around and shift during play. I'm very impressed with the product so far.
customer_reviews.author: J. Button

customer_reviews.title: Runs small but good quality
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 11y/o son. They run small and are very tight so they are hard to get on and when he gets all sweaty from playing they are nearly impossible to get off. If I bought them again I would buy a size up from what he is. I know you want them tight so they don't fall down but I think buying a size up they would fit perfect. They are extremely light weight and flexible while still offering protection. Over all he likes them and has been wearing them regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Albright

customer_reviews.title: light shin pads for kids
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit of a pain to get on and off because they are quite tight fitting. But my son likes them as an alternative to some basic shin pads that were always slipping down his socks. Not sure how protective they are but they are light and breathable and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: anthonyg

customer_reviews.title: They stay on alright!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time and intact. Product is what is described. Very easy to get on and stays on. I took off 2 stars because OMG I CANT GET THE DARN THINGS OFF! The only way I can get these off of my 8 yo is to wait until he cools down COMPLETELY. If your child is the littlest tiniest bit sweaty then forget it. Not thrilled but not disappointed. It has actually added a little comedy to our lives...for now.
customer_reviews.author: michelle s

customer_reviews.title: May not be your cup of tea
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I had greater expectations than was delivered. Bought for my daughter and when she tried them on she said they were very comfortable but the shin guard did not protect well from the impact. I did not believe her so I tried them for myself and the impact protection left much to be desired. However Amazon's return Policy is Amazing so we had no issues returning the shin guards
customer_reviews.author: Juan C. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & Flexible
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I bought the L/XL youth size for my 8 year old and they fit with some room to grow. They are flexible and lightweight as described and like others mentioned they can be a bit challenging to get off but just take a little effort to get the technique down. We used the hard plastic style shin guards with the built in ankle protection in the past which took similar effort to remove. Overall my son seems to really like these and seem to provide good protection and allows excellent movement. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Karl Spies

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Bought is used for half the price and I am really pleased with the quality and comfort. I'm not sure if this will protect you from others legs because the padding is really soft but for biking this will protect my legs from pedals for sure. I was little worried cause im a small guy and this large size wont fit on my shins but it fits real tight and comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Sun kyu, Choi

customer_reviews.title: GOOD SHIN GUARDS!!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 yr old son plays competitive soccer & really loves these shin guards. They don't move around while he's in play & they protect him. Being washable makes it VERY good!! The only complaint he has is the struggle to take them off after play. I guess the sweat makes them hard to come off but overall VERY happy with this purchase & will definitely buy another pair when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: These are easier to put on than the ones with straps! They are also easy to throw in the wash. They lasted 3 months of soccer and are still in decent shape.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed by how snug it fits
customer_reviews.text: Did not expect the fit to be so tight on my son's legs. Although the snug fit undoubtedly provides proper protection, my son is unable to remove the guards by himself. He has to twist them around and then have somebody help to remove them. If I had to do it over again, I would probably prefer a more typical strap system rather than the sock-based application.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mixed emotions?!?
customer_reviews.text: I wanted my son to love this item and it fell a little short because of the difficulty in getting the item on and off the foot! But it is a really good item that is lightweight and comfortable and very sturdy, just not that easy to get on and off especially if sweaty!
customer_reviews.author: C.L. Trusty

customer_reviews.title: Great product - my 2 boys are happy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for both of my boys and they both like them much better than traditional shin guards. My 6yo is in the S/M and my 10 yo is in the L/XL.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Abernathy

customer_reviews.title: Great but hard to take off
customer_reviews.text: Great but no way to take off while wet. Even if dry, adult assistance required
customer_reviews.author: Swiss Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: These were great for my 6 and 8 year old kids. They allow adequate shin protection without the bulk of two pairs of socks (when wearing the built in type plus kit). I highly recommend since both of my children said they were much more comfortable. Easy to machine wash and durable, too...
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Elastics are too tight but the product is nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought size s for my 7 y old son but I think he needs m. Buy little bigger size because the elastics on top that holds it below the knees are very tight, may be too tight to wear comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Ferrero Rocher

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So sleek yet protective. Great technology. My 7 year old son loves these. I have to keep him from wearing these to school everyday. These hold up just like traditional shin guards for soccer. I need to buy another pair for my 6 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shin guards for my petite, 12 year old son. Was worried about the protection since they are not hard but thus far, they have done their job. The shin guards are a bit hard to get off due to how snug they fit the leg.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel T.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the functionality of the product hate the qualtity. We bought them June 2018 and here it is September 2018 and they are coming apart at the seams. Need higher quality materials!
customer_reviews.author: Frank D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 13 y.o. soccer player. We measured his café prior to ordering and did not go wrong on the size. Thanks for the great service!!
customer_reviews.author: Griff #1

customer_reviews.title: Works great, BUT!
customer_reviews.text: Update: Latest pair I bought got ripped in a few weeks. I am really disappointed. These are not cheap! The first pair lasted for a year and a half. I love these shin guards. They work great. My son plays competitively and he won’t use other shin guards. Never gets lost, and I wash them weekly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shin guards
customer_reviews.text: These are the absolute best shin guards. They don’t have that strap that is so annoying under your foot. My son says they are super comfortable and protecting.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Munson

customer_reviews.title: So far these are great! My 12 year old son has stick legs ...
customer_reviews.text: So far these are great! My 12 year old son has stick legs and we purchased the L/XL youth size. We love that they are all one MACHINE WASHABLE piece. He had issues before with his inserted shinguards sliding around, even in a sleeve. These do not budge!
customer_reviews.author: cartert9

customer_reviews.title: Best in the market
customer_reviews.text: This shin guards are literally awesome I bought two pair they good for indoor or outdoor soccer so comfortable and light weight
customer_reviews.author: Halil

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for even the pickiest kid
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old really likes his soccer club but almost let his hatred of having to wear shin guards keep him from playing this fall. I found these in my search for a more comfortable option and I have to say, they’re awesome. My son loves them and will even keep them on when practice/game is over bc he just forgets they’re on. My husband (who played through college) can’t get over the years he spent wearing horribly bulky and uncomfortable guards. These are a must try, especially if you have a picky child.
customer_reviews.author: SDP

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy and I recommend it to all the girls on my daughter's team. Easy to wear and has no issue with it moving around while she plays. The ability to wash it is an extra bonus.
customer_reviews.author: D Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Nice shin guards
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Easy to put on. No skin irritation to shins with these, unlike the traditional shin guards.
customer_reviews.author: BillyDoc

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: These are very light weight and snuggly wrap around my sons shins where there is no contact with foot or ankle (which he likes) but they are VERT TIGHT and very difficult to get on and off. They seem to protect well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jbangash

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to get on.
customer_reviews.text: I don't really recommend these because they are really hard to pull up past your ankle bone. My son doesn't really like them and prefers his old shin guards.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Kind

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done -protecting your shins
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very lightweight. Since it didnt snuggly fit my shins, it rotates a bit but is manageable. I wish the spandex material was a bit most sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: D Cgain

customer_reviews.title: Runs small!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the idea of these but the sizing is off. 12yr old son couldn't even get them over his foot
customer_reviews.author: PiGilly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for soccer!
customer_reviews.text: My son complained everytime he wore the hard shin guards when he played soccer and refused to run. We purchased these and they are amazing! Complaining has disappeared.
customer_reviews.author: Bradford Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Too thin
customer_reviews.text: My son complains about these being too thin. He says there’s no protection at all. His other guards had better protection and they’re not certified.
customer_reviews.author: JKW

customer_reviews.title: Unrestrictive,  cool pads.
customer_reviews.text: Great protection from flat pedals. They stay put and clean easily. Wish they were about an inch longer on the padding. Space below knee is unprotected.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old son loves these! He says they are so much more comfortable than his traditional guards. I love them because I can throw them in the washer and then let them air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kera Butler

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Both my kids wear these all soccer season and both love them. My son is 5ft and 90 pounds and fits in youth large they are a bit big but once his soccer socks are on they aren't to bad. My daughter is 57 inches and she is 70 pounds in the s/m ones and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Anb

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome especially for lil guys who hate shin guards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems good product
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully designed: light, flexible, convenience and good look. 4 star for not being able to to protect as hard shelled shinguard does - you can feel the pain when you knock with your knuckles.
customer_reviews.author: Umidjon Begmatov

customer_reviews.title: Best soccer shin guard on the planet!!!
customer_reviews.text: Every soccer player should be wearing these. These are lighter and more durable than traditional shin guards and are easier to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Pmoore005

customer_reviews.title: Love these shin guards
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son and he absolutely loves them! He hates straps so the fact that these slide on like a socks makes it the perfect product for us!
customer_reviews.author: Javonna Ashlock

customer_reviews.title: Must have for all youth players...light, airy, protection.
customer_reviews.text: Have worked well so far. I bought two pairs for my son's that play on an elite level. I have an 8 year old and a 6 year old that play U9. The younger one got a rash with the regular shin guards. I treated it and got them both these so far so good and they don't smell! I wash after each use and took he advise of one of the reviews and put ankle socks to pull them off easily. I ordered the larger size for both of them. I don't put them in the dryer and they are fine the next morning. Defenitly a must for those who have rash issues with the regular ones.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo

customer_reviews.title: Great for our 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for our 4 year old playing outdoor soccer. They were comfortable and stayed in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good initially but the stitching comes undone
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has had two different sets of these and while they're comfortable the stitching keeps coming undone/unravelled on the top elastic band. Unfortunate because otherwise they're really great.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for young little leage atheletes!!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, quality product, packaged well, and good value.
customer_reviews.author: Marla G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shin Guard
customer_reviews.text: These are the only shin guards my 10 year old will wear. He’s played soccer for 4 years and has tried all types of shin guards. These stay in place, are comfortable and according to him protect his shin. Plus it allows him to have more mobility on the field.
customer_reviews.author: R. McClave

customer_reviews.title: The problem is they L-XL only goes to 4'6". ...
customer_reviews.text: The problem is they L-XL only goes to 4'6". Had I known I wouldn't have purchased. My son is 5'4".
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Daughter gear
customer_reviews.text: Daughter has these and plays at least 2 games a week. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: John Zeballos

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them and said that they feel good one. He can run and play soccer without the need to adjust the regular shingards
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Size is off
customer_reviews.text: I bought the correct size and they do not fit
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My 8yr old loves hers. They stay put, without the constant adjustments like the plastic ones require.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and tough
customer_reviews.text: Super light shin guard that does it’s job. The slip on sock style makes it easy to put on quickly. Very light weight and so far they are durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Great for Goal Keepers
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a goal keeper and jumping all around she is 10 this pair stays put no adjusting during games.
customer_reviews.author: sagetime

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My soccer player loves these shin guards. So much more comfortable than the hard plastic ones.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These were much more comfortable for my son than the ones that are hard plastic and a strap. Challenging to put on and off, but worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lewandowski

customer_reviews.title: No slipping
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the standard shin guards. No slipping! My son loves them!
customer_reviews.author: DTC3

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. They fit perfectly and have the same protection as the hard plastic ones. He says they are very comfortable and he often forgets to take them off after a game. I will definitely buy again when he grows to the next size.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for skateboarding
customer_reviews.text: These are being used for skateboarding. They fit snug. My 11 yr old wears them over his socks. His shins are finally recovering. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: veronica archer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Just a little tight for my daughter but perfect for my son. The sleeves appear to stay in place during matches
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fit struggle
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a large person...these are a struggle to get on.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmie

customer_reviews.title: Great protection and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Great protection and comfort. Dufficult to take off (we can live with that). Hope they will last for at least a season
customer_reviews.author: Gleb

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: They run pretty small, I had to get my average size 9 year old the Adult size
customer_reviews.author: John Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Photos are deceiving!
customer_reviews.text: More like an ankle guard! Not worth the price! Dave you money!
customer_reviews.author: larry w callaway

customer_reviews.title: TOO SMALL
customer_reviews.text: How can I return back order? and get a bigger size. 12 year old kid size
customer_reviews.author: vladimir

customer_reviews.title: Son likes
customer_reviews.text: Easy to slid on and off my son likes them better than others don’t slide around
customer_reviews.author: rudy

customer_reviews.title: ... also they do not hold in the smell as bad as her old ones
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the protection and light feel of the shin guards-- also they do not hold in the smell as bad as her old ones.
customer_reviews.author: chris beman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved them so much he slept in them
customer_reviews.author: Richard M. Webb.

customer_reviews.title: Very light
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old son likes this shin guards and he is able to wear them by himself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes, buy these
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Our 10 year old ask to try these and we are so glad we did. Absorbs impact, doesn’t slide or twist. No complaints from our soccer player.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN L. BUTTERWORTH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for my son. They give excellent protection, but feel like you were wearing nothing.
customer_reviews.author: P Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Too small vs product size chart description
customer_reviews.text: The item was too small versus what was described in product size chart.
customer_reviews.author: Nijat

customer_reviews.title: don't hesitate!  buy it
customer_reviews.text: bought to to my son and had little doubt but once he wear it and I check on him I was impress!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shin guards
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shin guards my daughter said they fit perfect and are so comfortable. Extremely durable
customer_reviews.author: Shawnte Virdell

customer_reviews.title: Great multi sport pad! I use it for bmx
customer_reviews.text: Great pads for price, I use them for bmx cause I left my other set at my house. They're lightweight and have nice cushion
customer_reviews.author: Zach Bogan

customer_reviews.title: Sizing chart runs on the small size
customer_reviews.text: They looks cool but I ordered the wrong size. Gave it away to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: CKAM

customer_reviews.title: Like not wearing shin guards at all
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these. Like not wearing shin guards at all!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: These tore within a month of my daughter having them. Not worth the $$
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: These are great!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are far more comfortable than the strap on guards!
customer_reviews.author: Susi

customer_reviews.title: Great for mountain biking
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable. I use them for mountain biking
customer_reviews.author: Andy Musser

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong number asked for L/XL received S/M and ir did not fit my son.
customer_reviews.author: Eva  Laufey

customer_reviews.title: Not great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Really light and absorbs impact well. Really difficult to take off.
customer_reviews.author: Luis P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shinguards
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these shinguards. The fact that I could wash them after every game was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Howell

customer_reviews.title: The G forms are very comfortable. Problem Gone
customer_reviews.text: The guards with the foot strip hurt my soccer player's foot. The G forms are very comfortable. Problem Gone!
customer_reviews.author: CCP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are Amazing my son does not fuss with his shin guards any longer!

customer_reviews.title: They are light weight and fit his leg better than other shin guards
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. They are light weight and fit his leg better than other shin guards.
customer_reviews.author: D. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: She explains how comfortable they are
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them. She explains how comfortable they are. She lives them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: My son (10 years old) loves these shin guards. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ellice  Wirthlin

customer_reviews.title: Best shin guards
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter and she really likes them she said it feels like she has nothing on. My daughter says they are a 10 in her book. They arrived on time and as described.
customer_reviews.author: ATIZZY

product_meta.title: G-Form Pro S Compact Shin Guard
product_meta.description:
The Pro-S Compact Shin Guards are low profile and streamlined while still providing the superior impact protection young players need. G-Form’s patented SmartFlex padding is completely soft and flexible and only hardens on impact. Constructed with an ultra comfortable and durable sleeve, players no longer need to worry about guards shifting during play or causing a distraction. The guards are machine washable as well to keep you fresh and free from rash or irritation. Sold in pairs.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 *  Manual [PDF ] 
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :6 x 1.5 x 12 inches; 3.53 Ounces
 * Item model number :YSP0302019
 * Department :Unisex-teen
 * Date First Available :March 13, 2017
 * Manufacturer :G-Form LLC
 * ASIN :B01N9HKXK2

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #11,958 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #669 inSoccer Equipment 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.4 out of 5 stars434 ratings The Pro-S Compact Shin Guards are low profile and streamlined while still providing the superior impact protection young players need. G-Form’s patented SmartFlex padding is completely soft and flexible and only hardens on impact. Constructed with an ultra comfortable and durable sleeve, players no longer need to worry about guards shifting during play or causing a distraction. The guards are machine washable as well to keep you fresh and free from rash or irritation. Sold in pairs.
feature_bullets: Made in the USA and Imported
CERTIFIED PROTECTION: Meets NOCSAE and CE standards for play throughout the USA and EU
FLEXIBLE COMFORT: G-Form patented RPT padding is completely soft and flexible and only hardens on impact
PERFECT FIT: Constructed with an ultra-comfortable and durable sleeve. Players no longer need to worry about shin guards shifting during play or causing a distraction
EASY CARE: Machine washable - take them off and throw them in the wash after every use
IMPORTANT SIZING NOTE: Sizing is set for a snug fit and some users may prefer to order a size larger than normal.
